testcase.name: TC_002_POST_API_With Token
testcase.system-out: Given Requesting "BaseURI"..................................................passed Given Load Testdata form Specific Api sheet "BOOKS-API".....................passed Then Create Input File for json from Excel Sheet............................passed Then I go to "/api-clients/" and "POST" Api Request Saved in Json File "PostTestData.json" without charset.passed Then Save Final Response in "PostClientTokenResponse.json" output File......passed Then Get the Token Number From "accessToken" Response.......................passed Then I go to "/orders" and "POST" Api Request Saved in Json File "CreateOrderidTestData.json" with Barear Token.passed Then Get the Order Number From "orderId" Response...........................passed Then Save Final Response in "PostOrderIDResponse.json" output File..........passed Then I go to "/orders/:" and "PATCH" Api Request Saved in Json File "PatchjasonTestData.json" with Barear Token.passed Then Save Final Response in "PatchOrderResponse.json" output File...........passed Then I am validating object "error" for string value "No order with id :." For "Order"..passed Then I go to "/orders/:" and "DELETE" Api Request Saved in Json File "DeleteTestdataRequest.json" with Barear Token.passed Then Save Final Response in "DeleteTestdataResponse.json" output File.......passed
